We Design What You Feel.

Turning your ideas into living, breathing spaces.

Schedule Now

Welcome to Lumariq, we are a growing studio crafting premium interiors and architectural experiences. Based in the UAE, we collaborate with a handpicked network of design professionals to bring your spaces to life — with care, creativity, and clarity.

About Us

Lumariq is a design-focused interior & architecture studio crafting refined, functional spaces rooted in story and style. With a presence in both the UAE and India, we specialize in blending modern elegance with cultural nuance.

Why Lumariq

  • Refined aesthetics with a focus on timeless design.
  • Personalized, client-focused approach.
  • Detail-oriented execution with cultural nuance.

Our Services

Smooth walk-throughs showcasing the full project feel.

VR 360 Walkthroughs

Immersive, interactive designs in 360° environments.
